content: --- title: Stations Service description: published: true date: 2024-09-05T12:17:05.365Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T12:06:21.117Z --- # Stations Service ### Request ``` https://riverxtest.sunexpress.com/v1/ground/stations/{stationId} ``` ### Response ```json { "extraInfo": "Stations Service Info", "stationId": "VCE", "stationName": "VENICE/TESSERA", "city": "VENICE", "region": "EUR", "country": "IT", "address": "VENICE", "latitude": "N45257", "longitude": "E01223", "email": "venice@station.com", "phone": "399999999999", "fax": "399999999999", "telex": "399999999999", "manager": "Enrico Leonardo", "managerEmail": "venicemanager@station.com", "managerPhone": "399999999999", "timezone": "IT", "icao": "LIPZ" } ``` ### GraphQL Query Root ``` getStations ```
